text: qalu: la takhaf, f'inna jina bialeadhab aldhy kan yashuku fih qawmak wala yusaddiqwn, wjynak bialhaqi min eind allh, wa'iinaa lsadqwn, fakhruj min baynihim wmek 'ahlak almwmnwn, baed murur juz' min allyl, wsr 'ant wra'hm; lialaa ytkhlf minhum ahd fynalh aledhab, wahdharuu 'ana yaltafit minkum ahd, wasreu 'iilaa hayth 'amarakum allh; litakunuu fi makan amyn
